features: pH-Balanced Perfection: Specially formulated to match and balance the pH levels of your intimate areas, our Ultra Gentle Feminine Wash Foam ensures your comfort and well-being. With a precise plant-based formula and key ingredient, lactic acid, this product maintains the delicate balance needed for daily intimate care as well as full body. Its effectiveness is clinically-proven, giving you peace of mind that your sensitive areas are treated with the utmost care.

Multi-Action Cleansing: Experience the ultra-effective cleansing power designed for women's intimate needs as well as full body. Our Foam wash goes beyond basic cleansing; it's a Multipurpose marvel, infusing moisturizing and protective benefits into your daily regimen. Women from all walks of life will appreciate the fresh, clean feel it provides, tackling odors and discomfort with clinically-proven finesse. Embrace a harmonizing solution that loves your body as much as you do.

Allergen-Free Assurance: Our Ultra Gentle Feminine Wash Foam options offer an allergen-free solution to your intimate care concerns. Crafted for the most sensitive of skin w/ naturally derived ingredients such as apple and sweet violet extract, it's free from common irritants, ensuring a soothing, non-irritating cleanse. Expert-tested and hypoallergenic, this wash provides protective and nourishing care without the worry, making it an essential part of your daily care.

Soothing & Luxuriating: Indulge in the luxurious and unscented embrace with our Ultra Gentle Feminine Wash Foam. This Expert-recommended formula soothes your intimate areas with every cleanse. Ingredients such as oats and fruit extracts pamper your skin, leaving it feeling delicate and Refreshed. Our commitment to premium, Ultra-gentle care transforms your daily routine into a luxuriating experience.

Transparent & Plant-Based Formula: Our Feminine Wash Foam is a testament to our commitment to transparency and quality. Naturally-derived ingredients from plant extracts like chicory roots, and coconut ensure refreshing and odor-minimizing benefits. We empower you with knowledge about our plant-based components, providing a cleansing experience that hydrates, refreshes, and boosts confidence with every use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perfect Ingredients for all Women Dermatologist Recommended Ingredients Experience gentle care with our feminine wash, enriched with natural lactic acid and chicory root. Specially formulated to nourish and balance your intimate skin microbiome, ensuring a feeling of freshness and comfort every day. The Cleansing Solution That Understands You Tailored for your unique needs, our product is ideal for sensitive skin, active women, expectant and new mothers, and those who prioritize natural ingredients and transparency. Embrace a solution that understands and caters to you.

What makes this wash different from other feminine hygiene products? Our wash stands out due to its unique blend of natural extracts, hypoallergenic properties, and a pH-balanced formula. The inclusion of key ingredients ensures it provides gentle yet effective care, making it a superior choice for intimate hygiene. Is Violet Vibes Feminine Wash safe for use during pregnancy and postpartum? Yes, our wash is formulated with the safety and sensitivity of pregnancy and postpartum care in mind. It contains gentle, safe ingredients like Oat Amino Acids and Apple Extract, which provide soothing cleansing during all bodily female changes. Does this product contain any harsh chemicals that could be harmful? Our formula is free from harsh chemicals, making it a safe and nurturing choice for intimate care.Our commitment to natural, gentle ingredients means you can use it with confidence, knowing your health is protected. Will using Violet Vibes Feminine Wash help reduce intimate area odors? Definitely! Our wash contains natural deodorizing agents like Apple and Violet Extracts. These ingredients work together to effectively reduce odors, maintaining freshness and confidence throughout the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great addition to my shower routine!
reviews.reviewText: So I am new to the idea of having targeted soaps and body washes specifically for femme areas/needs but now I'm a believer.I used to have occasional discomfort or dryness, etc, and my friend recommended that I try a more specialized or pH balancing soap to help since she had really positive results.Overall very happy, no more issues since starting this wash! Also works great as a body wash for the whole body, though I still use a stronger exfoliating scrub a couple of times a week besides this.Oh! And the lavender vanilla scent is very low-key and more lavendery, which is nice.Definitely becoming a fan of this brand - great quality that delivers what the products claim and the formulas seem clean and transparent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Made in USA
reviews.reviewText: This feminine wash is described as ultra-gentle, I love that it is plant based, cruelty free, paraben free, no alcohol, and made in the USA. The smell is a lot of lavender not as much vanilla but it is pleasant. Nice foaming consistency and I like that it is a pump mechanism top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the scent and the foam
reviews.reviewText: I love that this femine wash comes as a foam! Any others I've tried say to create a foam by rubbing your hands together, but this one pumps out a lusciously thick foam immediately. I also find the peppermint scent invigorating, and it also is pleasantly cooling "down there". I've tried a few different brands, but this is the one I reach for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice until the pump stopped working
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice, gentle, lightly scented feminine area cleanser, but I only got to use it twice before the pump broke and would not produce any more foam, just dribbles of liquid. Not sure if mine was defective or if this is something inherent in the design of the bottle, but either way, I’m unable to use it anymore.What I liked about this cleanser was that it was moisturizing, non-irritating and that the scent was not too strong. It removes odor and leaves a fresh feeling that lasts most of the day. I would continue to use it if I could figure out how to get the pump to work correctly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic cleanser. I love how well it cleans without being harsh. It keeps everything fresh for a long time. There's no fragrance to it though there is the scent of the ingredients in the cleanser.I typically use a popular brand that had hilarious commercials online. Still my favorite deodorant but this I prefer over the acidified cleanser. I'm really happy with it. I will be buying again as it eliminates all odors and feels very fresh and really, who doesn't want that?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The scent is a definite no for me
reviews.reviewText: *Edit* My daughter liked the scent & uses it. Unfortunately, the pump refuses to work now. She cannot press it down all the way without using both hands while its sitting on the shower floor. And after that, it comes out in liquid form, not foam.This cleanser produces a light, fluffy foam that is easy to use & rinses clean. I tested it on my hand to make sure there wouldn't be any reaction. While gentle on the skin, the lavender vanilla scent is not pleasant at all to me. It smells so weird. Like there is a hint of vinegar to it. That's just my personal experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I decided to try this feminine wash because I work in the fitness industry and I'm constantly worried about odor after a good workout. Also, sometimes in the middle of the day, you just want to freshen up without having to take a whole shower. This is a nice, lightweight cleansing foam. While it claims to be unscented, I don't really think there is such a thing as a truly unscented product. I noticed a very light scent, but it smelled fresh and I don't think it would bother even those sensitive to smells. As promised, it's very gentle and didn't cause any irritation or itching. It does naturally eliminate any body odor without perfumes. However, I've tried other similar products that had a long lasting, odor controlling effect. I don't think this product was as effective. That said, it works very well and if you're not sweating in leggings every day, you'll likely be very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Natural, Gentle, Refreshing
reviews.reviewText: This feminine wash is gentle, leaving you with a clean and refreshed feeling after each use. I like that it is made with natural ingredients and no harsh chemicals or fragrances. The scent of lavender and vanilla is a lovely combination that adds a nice touch to your feminine routine. The wash is dispensed in the form of a white foam from the pump top of the bottle. The discreet bottle is easy to grasp and the pump functions easily as well. The wash lathers well, keeps you fresh and clean, and the bottle is portable and easy to slip into your purse, bag, suitcase, etc.... I recommend this product for everyday use, as well as for intermittent odor protection or for cleansing during menstruation. This is a natural, gentle, effective feminine wash. AAA+++
